title: JSONSchema description of Packages
description: Specify how Packages are defined in JSON

link_type.description: Specify how Link Types are defined in JSON

metadata.description: Attach metadata to this link type

name.description: Provide a short descriptive name for this link type

description.description: Provide a short description (~1 paragraph) of the purpose of this link type

colour.description: Specify a colour for this link type, used when drawing networks as a diagram

transport.description: optional, specify if this link type carries a stream or iterator of values

node_type.description: Specify how Node Types are defined in JSON

metadata.description: Attach metadata to this node type

name.description: Provide a short descriptive name for this node type

description.description: Provide a short description (~1 paragraph) of the purpose of this node type

clients.description: Define clients of this node - specify a mapping from client name to its definition

input_ports.description: Specify a mapping from an input port name to its definition

link_type.description: the link type of the port, qualified with the package name

allow_multiple_connections.description: whether this port allows more than one connection to other ports, defaults to false

output_ports.description: Specify a mapping from an output port name to its definition

link_type.description: the link type of the port, qualified with the package name

allow_multiple_connections.description: whether this port allows more than one connection to other ports, defaults to false

id.description: Provide a unique id for this package

configuration.description: Specify code that handles the package configuration

clients.description: Define clients of this package's configuration - specify a mapping from client name to its definition

name.description: Provide a short descriptive name of this package

description.description: Provide a short description (~1 paragraph) of the purpose of this package

version.description: Specify the version of the package

display.description: Specify how nodes in this package are displayed in a network diagram

icon.description: Provide the URL of a SVG icon, relative to the package

corners.description: Define the shape of the node, in terms of the number of corners

style.description: Specify CSS styles to apply to this node's icon

node_types.description: mapping from a node type id to its definition

link_types.description: mapping from a link type id to its definition
